title: Sacrificial animal that has hole in its ear, its horn is broken, its teeth have fallen Assimalhakeem
transcript: [Music] [Music] foreign [Music] so what is the ruling on an animal that has a hole in its ears or they cut it either through the length of the wet the ears it's themselves or some of its teeth had fallen down or its horn was broken offering it as an is valid but this is not the best you can get so it is macro it is disliked to offer but it does the job it is permissible for you to offer it depends on how close you want to get to allah [Music] foreign [Music]
